mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, review.* from ( select * from review order by post_id desc) review) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.insert: insert into review (post_id, title, read_count, reg_date, content, item_type, nick, review_file) values(review_seq.nextval, #{title}, 0, sysdate, #{content}, #{item_type}, #{nick}, #{review_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update review set read_count = read_count + 1 where post_id=#{post_id}
update review set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, review_file=#{review_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_date = sysdate where post_id=#{post_id}
